channel.title: GER:ALV on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in GER:ALV on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Germany’s Allianz Offers Debt in Litmus Test for Perpetual Bonds
item.description: Allianz SE is selling a fresh batch of its riskiest bonds, in a deal investors say could set the tone for the subordinated debt market.
